hero.title: Hotel Sherpa Soul
hero.subtitle: Premium Comfort
hero.paragraph: Experience unparalleled hospitality in the heart of Kathmandu. Our boutique hotel seamlessly blends traditional Nepalese charm with contemporary luxury, creating memories that last a lifetime.
hero.modalDesc: Take a virtual journey through our luxurious accommodations and discover the perfect blend of tradition and modernity.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Welcoming National & International Guests with Authentic Sherpa Hospitality

roomsHero.paragraph: Comfort, style, and functionality—all in one place.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: A curated collection showcasing moments that define our journey and vision
gallery.featuredDesc: Explore our carefully selected images that capture the essence of our brand and story
gallery.desc1: Our cozy sitter rooms offer a peaceful environment with top-notch facilities suitable for families and solo travelers alike. Perfect for relaxing stays with easy access to hotel amenities.
gallery.desc2: The single sitter rooms are designed for comfort and convenience, ideal for guests looking for a quiet, private space with modern decor and essential amenities.
gallery.desc3: Spacious rooms featuring elegant furnishings and a king-size bed, perfect for couples or business travelers seeking luxury and convenience.
gallery.desc4: Deluxe rooms with scenic views, equipped with high-speed Wi-Fi and premium services tailored for an exceptional stay.
gallery.desc5: Our executive suite offers an exquisite blend of comfort and style, designed to meet the needs of discerning guests.
gallery.desc6: Comfortable rooms with contemporary design elements, ensuring a relaxing atmosphere and all necessary conveniences.
gallery.desc7: Standard rooms featuring cozy bedding and access to all hotel services, ideal for budget-conscious travelers.
gallery.desc8: Well-appointed rooms perfect for families, offering ample space and child-friendly facilities.
gallery.desc9: Classic rooms with modern amenities and easy access to hotel dining and recreational options.
gallery.desc10: Comfort and elegance combined in these rooms, suited for both short and long stays with a focus on guest satisfaction.

en.title: Hotel Sherpa Soul – Thamel, Kathmandu
en.description: We are located in Thamel, the bustling heart of Kathmandu — just steps away from cultural landmarks, restaurants, shops, and local experiences.

aboutStory.paragraph1: Nestled in the heart of Thamel, Kathmandu, Hotel Sherpa Soul offers a unique blend of cultural charm, comfort, and convenience for both national and international travelers exploring the wonders of Nepal.
aboutStory.paragraph2: Whether you're a local guest discovering your own country's treasures or an international visitor exploring Nepal's majestic landscapes and historic sites, our hotel serves as the perfect base with warm hospitality and modern amenities.
aboutStory.paragraph3: At Hotel Sherpa Soul, we proudly welcome guests from across Nepal and around the world, sharing the authentic essence of Sherpa warmth in the capital's most vibrant neighborhood.

aboutWhy.subtitle: What makes our guest house a peaceful, practical base in Kathmandu

authenticSherpaCulture.title: Authentic Sherpa Culture
authenticSherpaCulture.description: Experience the warmth and traditions of Sherpa hospitality, welcoming both Nepali and international guests with equal care.

primeThamelLocation.title: Prime Thamel Location
primeThamelLocation.description: Ideal for Kathmandu explorers — close to markets, eateries, and heritage sites.

inclusiveHospitality.title: Inclusive Hospitality
inclusiveHospitality.description: Thoughtful service and amenities tailored for solo travelers, families, and groups.

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.description: No language barrier — guided help from check‑in to check‑out.

complimentaryWifi.title: Complimentary Wi‑Fi
complimentaryWifi.description: Reliable high‑speed internet throughout your stay.

cleanAndSecure.title: Clean & Secure
cleanAndSecure.description: Daily housekeeping and secure access so you can feel at ease.

description.part1: To be the most trusted and beloved hotel in Kathmandu — where every guest, whether from Nepal or abroad, experiences the harmony of
description.part2: , cultural richness, and thoughtful comfort that bridges local warmth with international standards in the heart of the Himalayas.

brand.title: Hotel Sherpa Soul
brand.description: A peaceful escape in the heart of Thamel, blending comfort, culture, and Sherpa hospitality

intro.title: Services We Offer
intro.desc: We provide comfortable accommodations with all the essential amenities of a modern hotel. Enjoy a hassle-free experience with reliable service.

services.title: Clean & Airy Rooms
services.desc: Spacious and well-ventilated rooms with daily cleaning service.

services.title: Free Wi-Fi
services.desc: High-speed internet available throughout the building.

services.title: Cable TV
services.desc: Access to both local and international channels.

services.title: Room Service
services.desc: Delicious meals and drinks delivered right to your room.

services.title: Secure Storage
services.desc: Safes available to store your valuables.

services.title: Hot Showers
services.desc: 24-hour hot water to ensure your comfort.

homeTestimonial.text: The warmth and hospitality at Sherpa Soul Stay Inn made our trip unforgettable. From the moment we arrived, we felt like family. The traditional welcome ceremony with khada scarves was deeply moving.
homeTestimonial.name: Emily Dawson
homeTestimonial.title: Travel Blogger, UK

homeTestimonial.text: A peaceful retreat nestled in the hills with breathtaking views of the Himalayas. Perfect for relaxation and cultural immersion. The meditation sessions at sunrise were transformative.
homeTestimonial.name: Takeshi Mori
homeTestimonial.title: Photographer, Japan

homeTestimonial.text: I loved the cozy rooms with traditional Nepali decor and modern amenities. The food was phenomenal - authentic dal bhat and momos were the highlights. The staff were incredibly attentive and kind.
homeTestimonial.name: Sarah Jennings
homeTestimonial.title: Writer, Australia

homeTestimonial.text: Sherpa Soul Stay Inn felt like a home away from home. A truly soulful experience where ancient traditions meet modern comfort. The evening cultural performances were mesmerizing.
homeTestimonial.name: Carlos Rivera
homeTestimonial.title: Backpacker, Peru

homeTestimonial.text: I can't wait to return next season. The mountain view from my balcony was breathtaking! Watching the sunrise paint the peaks golden while sipping traditional butter tea was magical.
homeTestimonial.name: Lina Mehta
homeTestimonial.title: Travel Filmmaker, India

homeTestimonial.text: From welcome tea ceremony to check-out blessing, every moment was thoughtfully curated. The attention to detail and genuine care for guests' well-being exceeded all expectations.
homeTestimonial.name: Thomas Lee
homeTestimonial.title: Hotel Critic, South Korea

homeTestimonial.text: They went above and beyond to accommodate my dietary needs and allergies. The organic garden-to-table experience was incredible. A+ service with genuine Sherpa hospitality!
homeTestimonial.name: Juliette Morin
homeTestimonial.title: Chef & Traveler, France

homeTestimonial.text: Every corner of the inn tells a story of Sherpa heritage. Beautifully designed with sustainable materials and heartfelt service. The architecture perfectly blends tradition with luxury.
homeTestimonial.name: George Franklin
homeTestimonial.title: Architect, USA

homeTestimonial.text: The trek guidance and local insights provided by the inn's team were invaluable. They helped us discover hidden gems and sacred sites that typical tourists never see.
homeTestimonial.name: Anna Schmidt
homeTestimonial.title: Adventure Guide, Germany

homeTestimonial.text: The spa treatments using traditional Himalayan herbs were rejuvenating. The hot stone massage after a long day of trekking was pure bliss. Highly recommend the wellness packages!
homeTestimonial.name: Maria Gonzalez
homeTestimonial.title: Wellness Coach, Spain

homeTestimonial.text: As a solo female traveler, I felt completely safe and welcomed. The community atmosphere among guests and the family-like treatment from staff made my stay extraordinary.
homeTestimonial.name: Priya Sharma
homeTestimonial.title: Solo Traveler, Canada

homeTestimonial.text: The sustainable tourism practices and support for local communities impressed me greatly. This inn truly embodies responsible travel while providing luxury comfort.
homeTestimonial.name: David Chen
homeTestimonial.title: Environmental Scientist, Singapore

introsub: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Kathmandu, our boutique haven offers a perfect fusion of timeless Nepalese heritage and modern elegance. Every detail is crafted to provide warmth, comfort, and unforgettable experiences for every guest.
heroParagraph: Experience unparalleled hospitality in the heart of Kathmandu. Our boutique hotel seamlessly blends traditional Nepalese charm with contemporary luxury, creating memories that last a lifetime.
